As of October 10, 2023, Brent Crude oil traded at $92.50 per barrel, a 10% increase from the previous month, which has implications for our valuation of GreenField, currently estimated at $450 million.

Their Q3 performance report highlighted a 15% growth in their renewable segment, which now represents 30% of their total revenue.

Additionally, we should consider engaging with potential co-investors to mitigate our risk exposure while still benefitting from a larger stake.
